titles.title: FIRST Freedom Act
Further Independence of Religion for Security and Tolerance Freedom Act of 2015
To protect and promote international religious freedom.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights and International Organizations.

committee.subcommittee: Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights and International Organizations
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
